content.rendered:
Most of the countries in the world do not have a Consular office in Bangladesh. So, many people who have decided to travel to those countries are worried about where to submit the visa application.

 

In that case, what to do –

If a person is not able to submit his visa application in-person, they can submit it through the representative and must submit a Letter of Authorization along with the new document. However, there are some ambulances where applicant attendance is required.

Examples:

The person who is authorized in the letter must have his name and ID number.

§ It is important to note which authorization letter is being given to the purpose.

§ The nominee must have signature, contact details.
